Scripting functions that ask for a weapon ID need an integer that refers to the GTASA weapon ID list. They are listed below.
{{Note|
*Clip size () denotes clip size when the weapon is dual wielded. Weapons without this specification are not dual wield weapons.
*GTASA [[/Weapon_skill_levels.md|weapon stats]] will affect movement, accuracy, damage, and dual wield capability. See [[/setPedStat.md|setPedStat]] to change these stats. The default MTA server package comes with a resource called "defaultStats" that sets GTASA weapon stats to 999. See the weapon stats link for more info.
*For death reasons, especially in event handlers for onPlayerWasted or similar, also have a look at the [[/Death Reasons.md|Death Reasons]].
*'''Name''' is compatible with functions [[/getWeaponNameFromID.md|getWeaponNameFromID]], [[/getWeaponIDFromName.md|getWeaponIDFromName]].
}}
